document.full_text: almost half of the states, along with the national rail service amtrak, are eager to get the funds for building a high-speed train network that florida recently rebuffed, the transportation department said on wednesday.
document.title: states compete for florida's spurned rail funds
lines_and_colors: almost half of the states, along with the national rail service amtrak, are eager to get the funds for building a high-speed train network that florida recently rebuffed, the transportation department said on wednesday.
